reviews.review_msg: WATCH OUT FOR THIS CLASS ITS ROUGH AND THE TEACHER EXPECTS THE WORLD, YOU WILL GET A C ON AN A PAPER

Great guy!  Loved the material.  Really made me think.  I agree, memorization will not work in his class.  Critically think and engage with the material well before class and you can probably pull off at least a B.  A bit picky for grammar and proper English.

Highly recommend taking a course with Bob.  His style is different than other profs - more subtle, and encourages self-directed learning and critical thinking.  Not difficult to get good grades, but the usual high-school technique of memorizing information will not work here.  You have to think, observe and reflect.
He challenges you to formulate and further develop your thoughts.  I learned a lot from him and from the way he conducts class discussions.  Excellent person, excellent professor!
Best prof I've ever had. Cares for students and teaches students to think outside the box.

I've had Terry for 3 classes in my UD. He's a chill prof, tests are open-book and application based but not difficult. His classes are lecture and paper heavy but once again, not difficult. He is interesting, knowledgeable about the topic, and often shares stories. CMNS 447 was easy, it was dialogue based so all we did was talk to each other.
